meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Chuck Champagne Dave Hoffman Michael Shapiro Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4375.

div.div: Game data retrieved from an alternate archive.

td.p: Chuck Champagne, a vice president of finance from Cumberland, Rhode Island
Dave Hoffman, an account manager from Los Angeles, California
Michael Shapiro, a college teacher from Honolulu, Hawaii (whose 1-day cash winnings total $25,500)

tr.td: HISTORY
I WANNA ROCK!
WAY OUT WEST
RACK YOUR BRAIN
PILOT TALK
THE "UN"CATEGORY

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'On July 1, 1867 the British North America Act created this new dominion')

tr.td: On July 1, 1867 the British North America Act created this new dominion
